titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the Thursday before Thanksgiving as "Children's Grief Awareness Day".
Expressing support for the designation of the Thursday before Thanksgiving as "Children's Grief Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Supports the designation of Children's Grief Awareness Day to raise awareness of and support for grieving children.
